modName: Level up Sound Replacer Everquest DING
summary: Replaces level up sound, with the original DING! from Everquest
descriptionHtml:
Will probably be buried by other mods shortly but roaming the internet I discovered this sound file and was overcome with nostalgia =D

Simply replaces the usual level up loop with the DING! from Everquest

http://www.rozziland.com/eq/levelup.wav <- The sound and my source

Installation - Simple drag the content of the ZIP to your Skyrim install directory
Uninstallation - Delete the files you placed into your Skyrim install directory, either the entire \"Sound\" folder OR if you have other mods the ui_levelup.wav

Tested in game so it all good, and not too loud, the above link is rather loud, in game is seems to lower this volume =D
author: Sevtai3
